name: Cardfight!! Vanguard Tumblr Icons
description:
A gift for the Cardfight!! Vanguard fandom (Fanguard), which includes a Vanguard Circle as the home button and characters who replace the usual text, photo, quote, link, chat, audio, and video icons. Hope you guys enjoy!

Feel free to use it as you wish and edit it to your content. No need to credit me or anything, but it'd be nice to.
additional_info:
☆Update(s)
● (2/27/14): Fixed up the image links since it appears the website that hosted them isn't working properly. From your Stylish icon, be sure to click on [Check for update] under [Manage installed styles.] to make the images appear. 

● (12/4/13): Fixed up CSS to allow for icons to show up properly.
- Credit goes to no-anonname for her code.
- Code can be found here:
http://no-anonname.tumblr.com/post/67679917358/when-using-userstyles-theres-always-the-danger


Credit goes to:

● akarimichelle (deviantART)
Thank you very much for making a vector of the Vanguard Circle, which was used in making this style's home button. *laughs* It was pretty hard to find one initially, so it was a huge relief that you came along with yours. Thanks once again!

Link to her Vanguard Circle:
http://akarimichelle.deviantart.com/art/Vanguard-Circle-316391434


● Bushiroad
Characters used, which include Nitta Shin, Tokura Misaki, Kai Toshiki, Sendou Aichi, Suzugamori Ren, Sendou Emi, and Katsuragi Kamui (in that order), all belong to Bushiroad. The Vanguard Circles which come from Cardfight!! Vanguard belong to them as well.


● HayGurlHay (userstyles)
Thanks for inspiring me to make a Cardfight!! Vanguard version of the Tumblr icons you created for The World Ends with You. If this theme offends you in any way, free feel to let me know, and I'll take it down.

Here's the original in which my theme was based on:
http://userstyles.org/styles/72857/the-world-ends-with-you-tumblr-icons


● Square Enix and Jupiter
Characters used as templates, which include Minamimoto Sho, Yashiro Uzuki, Sakuraba Neku, Kiryu Yoshiya (Joshua), Misaki Shiki, Bito Raimu (Rhyme), and Bito Daisukenojo (Beat) (again, in that order), rightfully belong to Square Enix and Jupiter.
